sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Grid, Paper, Tabs, Tab, IconButton, Chip, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, Button } from '@mui/material'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, Line, PieChart, Pie, Cell, AreaChart, Area, ComposedChart, Scatter } from 'recharts'; import { InfoOutlined, Insights as InsightsIcon, TrendingUp, CheckCircle, Lightbulb, ArrowUpward, ArrowDownward } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { salesData, churnData, insights, productData, predictiveData } from '../data/analyticsData'; // Reusable Insight Card const InsightCard = ({ type, text, reason, action }) => { const getColors = () => { switch (type) { case 'critical': return { bg: '#ffebee', text: '#d32f2f', icon: }; case 'warning': return { bg: '#fff3e0', text: '#e65100', icon: }; case 'success': return { bg: '#e8f5e9', text: '#2e7d32', icon: }; default: return { bg: '#f5f5f5', text: '#616161', icon: }; } }; const colors = getColors(); return ( {colors.icon} {text} Why (Root Cause): {reason} üëâ Recommendation: {action} ); }; // 1. Descriptive Analytics View const DescriptiveView = () => ( üìä Descriptive Analytics "What happened?" - Sales dropped 12%. Profit margin analyzed. Monthly Sales & Profit Product Performance name} > {productData.map((entry, index) => ( ))} Metric Val Status Sales ‚Çπ45k AOV ‚Çπ1.2k
); // 2. Diagnostic Analytics View const DiagnosticView = () => ( üîç Diagnostic Analytics "Why did it happen?" - Price hikes caused drops. Price vs. Sales Relationship Complaints Analysis ); // 3. Predictive Analytics View const PredictiveView = () => ( üîÆ Predictive Analytics "What will happen?" - Forecast Q2 & Churn Risk. Sales Forecast Churn Risk Distribution {churnData.map((entry, index) => ( ))} {churnData.map(item => ( {item.group}: {item.value} ))} ); // 4. Insights View const InsightsView = () => ( üí° Insights & Solutions "The Solution" - Actionable intelligence. {insights.map((insight, index) => ( ))} RECOMMENDATION Reduce price to ‚Çπ110 immediately. ); const AnalyticsSuite = () => { return ( Analytics Command Center Real-time Business Intelligence Dashboard ); }; export default AnalyticsSuite;
